TextEng: Do you need some help?
Text: 도움 필요해?

TextEng: Forget it. You're on your own.
Text: 됐어. 혼자 알아서 해.

TextEng: I'll see what I can do.
Text: 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게.

TextEng: Tell me why I should bother helping you.
Text: 왜 널 도와야 하는지 말해봐.

TextEng: Fine, fine, I'll see what I can do.
Text: 알았어, 알았어, 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게.

TextEng: That doesn't sound like a reason. I guess I'll be leaving.
Text: 그게 이유같이 안 들리는데. 그럼 갈게.

TextEng: Come to think of it, maybe I should help the kobolds...
Text: 생각해보니, 코볼트들을 돕는 게 나을지도...

TextEng: Some kind of reward would be an incentive, you know.
Text: 뭔가 보상이 있으면 동기부여가 될 텐데.

TextEng: If you haven't noticed, Drogan's not here.
Text: 못 봤나 본데, 드로건은 여기 없어.

TextEng: Have you tried talking with them?
Text: 코볼트들이랑 대화는 시도해봤어?

TextEng: And losing your cook is a bad thing?
Text: 요리사 잃는 게 나쁜 일이야?

TextEng: Shouldn't the town guard handle this?
Text: 마을 경비가 처리해야 하는 거 아냐?

TextEng: So? I don't see this as my problem.
Text: 그래서? 이게 내 문제같이 안 보이는데.

TextEng: Why don't you finish them off, then?
Text: 그럼 네가 마무리하면 되잖아?

TextEng: Hmmm. I need an herb that might be in your kitchen.
Text: 흠. 네 주방에 있을지도 모르는 약초가 필요해.

TextEng: I should go.
Text: 가봐야겠어.

TextEng: Get over it. Mara's dead. I found the body.
Text: 인정해. 마라는 죽었어. 시신을 찾았어.

TextEng: I found Mara's body just outside of town. They killed her... I'm sorry.
Text: 마을 밖에서 마라의 시신을 찾았어. 죽였더라고... 유감이야.

TextEng: 50 gold?! Do better than that, or kobolds will be the least of your problems!
Text: 금화 50개?! 더 잘하는 게 좋을 거야, 아니면 코볼트가 문제의 전부가 아닐 테니까!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I'm sure you can do better than that, Lodar.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 더 잘할 수 있을 거 같은데, 로다르.

TextEng: 50 gold would be fine, thanks.
Text: 금화 50개면 괜찮아, 고마워.

TextEng: Actually, all I really need is some Helmthorn berries.
Text: 사실, 진짜 필요한 건 투구가시 열매야.

TextEng: No reward is necessary. I was happy to help.
Text: 보상은 필요 없어. 도울 수 있어서 기뻤어.

TextEng: Sounds good to me!
Text: 좋은데!

TextEng: No, I won't break my word to them. Let them go.
Text: 아니, 약속 어기지 않을 거야. 보내줘.

TextEng: That's a little bloodthirsty of you, isn't it?
Text: 좀 피에 굶주린 거 아냐?

TextEng: So then we're no better than they are?
Text: 그럼 우리가 코볼트들보다 나을 게 없잖아?

TextEng: I suppose you're correct. Do what you wish, then.
Text: 네 말이 맞는 것 같아. 그럼 원하는 대로 해.

TextEng: They're helpless, now. I won't permit a slaughter just to ease your anger.
Text: 코볼트들 무력해. 네 분노 풀려고 학살은 허락 안 해.

TextEng: They have broken the law. We should imprison them.
Text: 법을 어겼어. 감옥에 가둬야지.

TextEng: I convinced them to surrender, didn't I? And they let Mara live?
Text: 항복하도록 설득했잖아? 그리고 마라는 살려뒀고?

TextEng: That's my point. There should be a difference between us and monsters.
Text: 그게 내 요점이야. 우리랑 괴물들 사이엔 차이가 있어야지.

TextEng: Do what must be done, then. I'll not take part.
Text: 해야 할 일을 해. 난 참여 안 할 거야.

TextEng: No, I suppose they should pay for what they've done...
Text: 아니, 한 일에 대가를 치러야 할 것 같긴 해...

TextEng: Then yes, we let them go.
Text: 그럼 응, 보내주자.
